name: woodland ripple blanket
sizes_available: 120 cm/4 ft width to 210 cm/7ft width (twin to king)
notes:
woodland blanket cal runs from january 5 to february 23, 2018. 

fifteen shades of stylecraft special dk are used to create the woodland colour palette :

copper
tomato
spice
gold
mustard
lime
meadow
pistachio
lincoln
cypress
mocha
grey
silver
duck egg
storm

yardage is based on 15 balls of stylecraft special dk for twin blanket - 30 balls for larger blanket.
